name: Notepad4e
tagline: An upcoming notepad plugin for the Eclipse IDE.
body:
### Welcome to the Notepad4e update site!
It is recommended to download and install the plugin via the Eclipse Marketplace, but you can select *Help* -> *Install New Software* -> *Add...* and enter the address of this webpage in the *Location* field. Click *OK*, select the Notepad4e plugin that appears in the list and move on with the installation!

### Help, feature requests and issues
Simply head to the [issues](https://github.com/PyvesB/Notepad4e/issues) section and open a new issue. For more general information, simply go to the project [home](https://github.com/PyvesB/Notepad4e).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
